EVJ.A: The global maximum heat value is {0.91}.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Fisheries and Export or the cell corresponding to Dairy and Technology Adoption?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Dairy} and {Technology Adoption} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Fisheries and Export or the cell corresponding to Farm Management and Yield?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Fisheries} and {Export} has a higher heat value.

MSR.Q: In the heatmap, what are the row and column labels for all cells whose heat values fall within the range of 0.49 to 0.76?
MSR.A: The cells are: {(Dairy, Cost), (Pest Control, Cost), (Crops, Export), (Farm Management, Export), (Forestry, Export), (Water Usage, Export), (Dairy, Labor), (Fisheries, Labor), (Pest Control, Labor), (Farm Management, Market Price), (Forestry, Market Price), (Dairy, Technology Adoption), (Fisheries, Technology Adoption), (Pest Control, Technology Adoption), (Crops, Weather Impact), (Farm Management, Weather Impact), (Forestry, Weather Impact), (Water Usage, Weather Impact), (Dairy, Yield), (Pest Control, Yield)}.
